189a6('bum): po bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//sred pa bdag gi don mA yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//len po bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//len pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad
189a7('bum): par mi bya'o//srid pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//srid pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//skye ba bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//skye ba bdag gi don
189b1('bum): ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rga shi bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rga shi bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ces spyad par
189b2('bum): mi bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
189b3('bum): bdog gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//brtson
189b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag
189b5('bum): gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//shes
189b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//nang stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyod par mi bya'o//nang stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//
189b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//phyi nang stong pa
190a1('bum): nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad
190a2('bum): par mi bya'o//chen po stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//chen po stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dron dam stong pa nyid bdag gri don ces
190a3('bum): spyad par mi bya'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag gi dran ces spyad par mi bya'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag gi
190a4('bum): don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//mtha'
190a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
190a6('bum): bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid badrag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dror po med pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/
190a7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes
190b1('bum): spyad par mi bya'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid
190b2('bum): stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par
190b3('bum): mi bya'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag
190b4('bum): gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don tsos spyad par mi bya'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dngos po med pa'i
190b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
190b6('bum): bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag gi dron ces spyad par mi bya'o//
190b7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag gi don ma
191a1('bum): yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dbang po rnams bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//dbang po rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//stobs rnams bdag
191a2('bum): gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//stobs rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag gi don ces spyod par mi bya'o//byang chub kyi yan
191a3('bum): lulag rnams po dag gi don mA yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//'phags pa'i lAm yan lag brgyad pa bdag
191a4('bum): gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o///
191a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//bsam gtan rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//tshad med pa rnams bdag gi don ces spyod par mi bya'o///
191a6('bum): tshad med pa rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag go don ces spyad par mi bya'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
191a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par
191b1('bum): mi bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag po don ces spyad par mi bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par
191b2('bum): mi bya'o//rnam par thar pA'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon po med pa bdog gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
191b3('bum): dang /smon pa med pa bdag gi don mAM yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//mngon par shes pa rnams bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//mngon par shes pa rnams bdag gi don ma yin
191b4('bum): zhes spyad par mi bya'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams bdog gi dron ces spyad par mi bya'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag gi don
191b5('bum): ces spyod par mi bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag gi don mi yin zhes spyod par mi bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//de bzhin gshegs
191b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//mi 'dzegs po bzhi bdog gi don cesnga spyad par mi bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//
191b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bdag gi don ces spyad par ma bya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//byams pa chen po bdag gi don
192a1('bum): ces spyad par mi bya'o//byams pa chen po bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//snying rje chen po bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//snying rje chen
192a2('bum): po bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag
192a3('bum): gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rgyun du zhugs po'i 'bras bu bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi
192a4('bum): bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i
192a5('bum): 'bras bu bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//dgra bcom pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//
192a6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//rang byang chub bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rang byang chub bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyod par mi bya'o//
192a7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//lo mi gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyod par ma bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192b1('bum): pa'i byang chub bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di
192b2('bum): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rdzob tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos
192b3('bum): gang don du bya ba'am/don med par bya ba de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma skyes kyang
192b4('bum): rung ste/chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos kyi gnas nyid ni gnas pa/chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ste/de ni gang la'ang don kyang mi byed do//don ma yin pa'ang mi byed do//rab 'byor
192b5('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don dang don ma yin par spangs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/
192b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la'ang don kyang mi bgyid/don ma lags pa'ang mi bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
192b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid gang yang mi byed de/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la'ang don du byed pa'ang ma yin/don ma yin pa byed
193a1('bum): pa'ang ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'dus ma bgyis sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam//
193a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don kyang yin te/phan pa'am gnod pa nye bar gnas pa
193a3('bum): ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang phan pa 'am gnod pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
193a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos gang la'ang phan pa'am gnod pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na byung
193a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma bgyis kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi bgyid dam/bcom
193a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs
193a7('bum): shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos gnyis
193b1('bum): su ma mchis pa'i chos thob par bgyid dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na gnyis kyi chos shig/gnyis kyi chos thob par bgyid pa lags
193b2('bum): sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam gnyis kyi chos sam/gnyis
193b3('bum): su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs pa na thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi dmigs pa ni thob pa ste/de ni dmigs pas kyang thob par mi 'gyur/mi dmigs pas kyang thob
193b4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u lnga bcu gsus pa'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgyar
193b5('bum): bzhi pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
193b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'ang dka' ba bgyid pa ste/sems can zhes bgyi ba 'am/sems can du gdags pa
193b7('bum): ni gang yang mi dmigs na/de dag ni sems can rnams kyi slad du/bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na//
194a1('bum): skyes bu la la zhig nam mkha' gzhi ma mchis pa la ljang bu bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can
194a2('bum): rnams kyi don du rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa'
194a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon
194a4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu la la
194a5('bum): zhig ljang bu bskyed par 'dod la/skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmigs/yal ga ma dmigs/sdong bu ma dmigs/lo ma ma dmigs/me tog ma dmigs/'bras bu
194a6('bum): ma dmigs pa ro ljang bu de'i sdong bu bskyed de/dus dus su chus bran zhing de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga phun sum tshogs par gyur/lo ma phun sum tshogs par gyur/me
194a7('bum): tog phun sum tshogs par gyur/'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /de ldeng bu de'i 'dab ma la spyod pa dang /me tog la spyod pa dang /'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang
194b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/de dag rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa
194b2('bum): drug la spyod cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/de dag lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de la lo ma
194b3('bum): ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'grol ba'o//me tog ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
194b4('bum): po la brten cing rgyal rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bo dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye
194b5('bum): ba dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba dang /mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba dang /dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba dang /'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba dang /tshangs
194b6('bum): ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /tshangs lha nye phon gyi lhar skye ba dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba dang /tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba dang /snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang /chung snang gi lhar skye ba dang /tshad
194b7('bum): med snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang /kun snang dang ba'i lhor skye ba dang /dge ba'i lhar skye ba dang /chung dge'i lhar skye ba dang /tshad med dge ba'i lhar skyo ba dang /dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba dang /che ba'i
195a1('bum): lhar skye ba dang /chung che'i lhar skye ba dang /tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba dang /'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba dang /mi che ba'i lhar skye ba dang /mi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba dang
195a2('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skyo ba dang /gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang /'og min gyi lhar skye ba dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skyo mched
195a3('bum): kyi lhar skye ba dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang /'du shes med 'du shes maud min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o//'bras bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
195a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /phyir mi
195a5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa dang /rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid
195a6('bum): la brten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/de dag kyang sems can thams cad 'bras bu la nye bar 'tshe ba
195a7('bum): bzhin nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag kyang rim gyis 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/theg pa chen po'am/
195b1('bum): theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur yang /de la sems can
195b2('bum): du'ang mi 'dogs/sems can du gdags pa'ang med par sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
195b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas zhes bya ba'i sems can+da na ma/sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so//
195b4('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni
195b5('bum): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyan 'chad par 'gyur ro//byol song gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur
195b6('bum): ro//gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/mi khom pa dang ngan song thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//dbul po thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//
195b7('bum): shul gyi rgyud dma' bo thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//
196a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor
196a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med na 'das pa dang ma
196a3('bum): byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du
196a4('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur/dgra bcom pa rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/
196a5('bum): sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur/byol song gi skye gnas thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur/gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun
196a6('bum): 'chad par mi 'gyur/'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'tshed par mi 'gyur/gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur/gzugs med pa'i khams thams
196a7('bum): cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bas na gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes zer
196b1('bum): bani rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid
196b2('bum): gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad du gdags pa dang /de bzhin
196b3('bum): nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du shes su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du byed du
196b4('bum): gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mig tu gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rna bar gdags pa dang /de bzhin
196b5('bum): nyid gang gis sngar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis lcer gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis lus su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis yid du gdags pa dang /de
196b6('bum): bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid grang gis sgrar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis dIr gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis ror gdwags pa dang /
196b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang gis reg tu gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis chos su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid
197a1('bum): gang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i rnam par shes
197a2('bum): par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis
197a3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg par gdugs pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gisra sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /de bzhin
197a4('bum): nyid gang gis lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags
197a5('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de
197a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de bzhini nyid glang gis lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang
197a7('bum): gis lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gi sa sa'i
197b1('bum): khams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid glang gis chu'i khams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis me'i khams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rlung gi khams su gdags
197b2('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid grang gis nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid grang gis rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis ma rig par
197b3('bum): gdags pa dang /dri bzhin nyid gang gis 'du byed du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis ming dang gzugs su gdugs
197b4('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched drug tu gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis reg par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor bar gdugs pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang
197b5('bum): gis sred par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gisra len par gradagasra pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis srid par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis skye bar gdags pa dang /
197b6('bum): de bzhin nyid glang gis rga shir gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags
197b7('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /de bzhi ni nyid gang gis bsam
198a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis nang stong pa nyid du
198a2('bum): gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis stong pa nyid stong
198a3('bum): pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis
198a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags
198a5('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhini nyid gang gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis
198a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags
198a7('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis ngo bo nyid
198b1('bum): stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis dran pa nye bar bzhags pa rnams su gdags pa
198b2('bum): dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis yang dag par spong ba rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid grang gis dbang po rnams
198b3('bum): su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis stobs rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags
198b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa dang /de bzhi ni nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis bsam gtan rnams su gdags
198b5('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis tshad med pa rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid
198b6('bum): gang gis rnam par thar pa brgyad du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par thar
198b7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mngon par shes pa rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis ting
199a1('bum): nge 'dzin rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
199a2('bum): bcur gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis mi 'jigs pa bzhir gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang
199a3('bum): gis byams pa chen por gdugs pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis snying rje chen por gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags
199a4('bum): pA dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis
199a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rang byang chub tu gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang
199a6('bum): gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams
199a7('bum): su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa de dag thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te/de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//byang chub sems
199b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid de la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des
199b2('bum): na de bzhin nyid tshad mar bya/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199b3('bum): pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
199b4('bum): shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo//chos thams cad kyi de bzhi ni nyid la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chos thams cad
199b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byed do//chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par/
199b6('bum): byas shing /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do//dbang po la mkhas par byas shing /dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do//dbang po yongs su bskang
199b7('bum): ba la mkhas pa thob par byas shing /sems can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do//sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes par byas shing /smon pa'i ye shes yongs su
200a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do//smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /dus gsum du ye shes rnam par drag par byed do//dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag
200a2('bum): par byas shing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do//sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//sangs
200a3('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//
200a4('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing /sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do//sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod nas/phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
200a5('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang legs pa thams cad mthong nas bdag gis
200a6('bum): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o//gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o//
200a7('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni
200b1('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa'
200b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o//gsol
200b3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
200b4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
200b5('bum): rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/sems can de dag gri bsod nams mang du 'phel
200b6('bum): lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis so//bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das
200b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i bsod nams
201a1('bum): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems drang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod
201a2('bum): nams kyi tshogs de la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag
201a3('bum): gi bsod nams des brgya'i cher yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye
201a4('bum): ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar
201a5('bum): mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las
201a6('bum): byung ba ni/gang zag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//
201a7('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi
201b1('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa'
201b2('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nyonye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi
201b3('bum): 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang
201b4('bum): nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
201b5('bum): las byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong
201b6('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa lta zhog gi/
201b7('bum): gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub
202a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi
202a2('bum): 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye bo brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
202a3('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang ma bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de
202a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa'
202a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog
202a6('bum): gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems
202a7('bum): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char
202b1('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong
202b2('bum): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
202b3('bum): las byung ba ni rigs kyi sa la gnas pa rnams te/rigs kyi sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
202b4('bum): khams kyi sems can thams cad rigs kyis la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi//gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la
202b5('bum): gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
202b6('bum): brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'o char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya stong gi char
202b7('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod//rgyur yang
203a1('bum): mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni brgyad pa'i sa rnams te/brgyad pa'i sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203a2('bum): bopo rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong
203a3('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i
203a4('bum): bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba
203a5('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar
203a6('bum): mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang ma bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung
203a7('bum): ba ni mthong ba'i sa rnams te/mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
203b1('bum): kyi sems can thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas
203b2('bum): par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya
203b3('bum): phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char
203b4('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang ma bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur
203b5('bum): yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/bsrabs pa'i sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203b6('bum): chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen
203b7('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
204a1('bum): po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang
204a2('bum): nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong
204a3('bum): gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod /rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems
204a4('bum): dpa' las byung ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no///
204a5('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
204a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
204a7('bum): pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
204b1('bum): bye ba brgya'i chang yang nye bAr mi 'gro'o//bye ba skyong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi
204b2('bum): 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni
204b3('bum): byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
204b4('bum): rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte ni gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams
204b5('bum): cang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong
204b6('bum): gri char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar
204b7('bum): mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang
205a1('bum): mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams te/rang sangs rgyas las byung
205a2('bum): ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par
205a3('bum): gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi
205a4('bum): bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang
205a5('bum): nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar
205a6('bum): mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char spang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur
205a7('bum): yang mi bzod do//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi
205b1('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub tu zhugs par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
205b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
205b3('bum): bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi
205b4('bum): 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
205b5('bum): sems drang po bskyed pas ci yid la bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad
205b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ji lta bu zhig mchis/dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/rnam pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
205b7('bum): pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni/dngos po med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/mtshan ma med pa/byed pa med pa/skye ba med pa/'byung ba med pa ste/rab 'byor gang
206a1('bum): yang 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig yod ces zer ba ni/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs pa med pa ste dran
206a2('bum): pas dbang sgyur ba/zhi ba'i rnam pa mtshan nyid med pa yin te/rab 'byor 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'o//'di ni dbang sgyur ba'o//'di ni rnam pa'o//
206a3('bum): 'di ni mtshan nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ba' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ma lags kyi gzugs kyang
206a4('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa lags/tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'du shes kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'du byed kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rnam par shes
206a5('bum): pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mig kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rna ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sna'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/lce'ang dngos po ma
206a6('bum): mchis pa lags/lus kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/yid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sgra'ang dngos po ma mchis
206a7('bum): pa lags/dri'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ro'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/reg kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/chos kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mig gi/
206b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa ljags/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/lce'i rnam par shes
206b2('bum): pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mig gi 'dus te reg
206b3('bum): pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lpags/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos
206b4('bum): po ma mchis pa lags/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
206b5('bum): ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa
206b6('bum): lags/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po mo mchis pa lags/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/yid kyi 'dus te reg
206b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sa'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/chu'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/me'i khams kyang dngos po
207a1('bum): ma mchis pa lags/rlung gi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/nam mkha'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rnam par shes pa'i khams
207a2('bum): kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ma rig pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'du byed kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/
207a3('bum): ming dang gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/skye mched drug kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa
207a4('bum): ljags/sred pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/len pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/srid pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/skye ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rga
207a5('bum): shi'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/bzod pa'i
207a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma
207a7('bum): mchis pa lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis
207b1('bum): pa lags/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/don
207b2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mtha'
207b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa
207b4('bum): lags/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis
207b5('bum): pa lags/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis
207b6('bum): pa lags/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang
207b7('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/dbang po rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa
208a1('bum): lags/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'phags pa'i bden
208a2('bum): pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/tshad med pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/gzugs med pa'i snyoms
208a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po
208a4('bum): ma mchis pa lags/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis
208a5('bum): pa lags/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma
208a6('bum): mchis pa lags/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
208a7('bum): pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/byams pa chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/snying rje chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis
208b1('bum): pa lags/btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags//
208b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o//tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//'du shes
208b3('bum): kyang dngos po med pa'o//'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//mig kyang dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//sna'ang dngos po med
208b4('bum): pa'o//lce'ang dngos po med pa'o//lus kyang dngos po med pa'o//yid kyang dngos po med pa'o//gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o//sgra'ang dngos po med pa'o//dri'ang dngos po med pa'o//ro'ang
208b5('bum): dngos po med pa'o//reg kyang dngos po med pa'o//chos kyang dngos po med pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//sna'i
208b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po
208b7('bum): med pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang
209a1('bum): dngos po med pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
209a2('bum): ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg
209a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//
209a4('bum): sa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//chu'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//me'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//rlung gi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//nam mkha'i khams kyang
209a5('bum): dngos po med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//ma rig pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po
209a6('bum): med pa'o//ming dang gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o//skye mched drug kyang dngos po med pa'o//reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//sred pa'ang dngos
209a7('bum): po med pa'o//len pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//srid pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//skye ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//rga shi'ang dngos po med pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
209b1('bum): dngos po med pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'angadra dngos po med pa'o//
209b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med
209b3('bum): pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//
209b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa
209b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med
209b6('bum): pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa
209b7('bum): nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang
210a1('bum): dngos po med pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//dbang po rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//stobs rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//byang chub
210a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//bsam gtan
210a3('bum): rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//tshad med pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//rnam par thar pa rnams kyang
210a4('bum): dngos po med pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang
210a5('bum): dngos po med pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//de bzhin
210a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//sangs
210a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//byams pa chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o//snying rje chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o//dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po
210b1('bum): med pa'o//btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o//'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
210b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do//rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa tha mas
210b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de/gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos
210b4('bum): po med pa'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do//chos thams
210b5('bum): cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad
210b6('bum): ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do//rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du
210b7('bum): rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
211a1('bum): dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par
211a2('bum): bgyid pa lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bzod pa'i pha
211a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
211a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
211a5('bum): dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams
211a6('bum): yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsami gtan dang po la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su drag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsam
211a7('bum): gtan gnyis pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsam gtan gsum pa la spyod cing /sangs
211b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can
211b2('bum): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/byams pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/snying rje la
211b3('bum): spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/dga' ba la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can
211b4('bum): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/btang snyoms la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/nam mkha'
211b5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing /
211b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang
211b7('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs
212a1('bum): su smin par bgyid pa lags/nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyed pa lags
212a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/phyi rlung stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
212a3('bum): yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can rnams
212a4('bum): yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/don dam
212a5('bum): pu stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas
212a6('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems
212a7('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par
212b1('bum): bgyid pa lags/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/dor ba med pa
212b2('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su drag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lugs/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
212b3('bum): yongs su drag po dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgro pa dang /sems can rnams
212b4('bum): yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/rang gi mtshani nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/mi
212b5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs
212b6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ngo bo nyid stong phra nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can
212b7('bum): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa
213a1('bum): lags/dran pa nye bar bzhug pa bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi dpa lags/yang
213a2('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin+da par bgyid pa lpags/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas
213a3('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/dbang po lnga la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can+da rnams yongs
213a4('bum): su smin par bgyid pa lags/stobs lnga la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun
213a5('bum): la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can+da rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/'phags pa'i lamra yan lag brgyad pA la spyod cing /sangs
213a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid po ligras/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
213a7('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsami gtan bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par gyid
213b1('bum): pa lags/tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
213b2('bum): bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
213b3('bum): dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can
213b4('bum): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su
213b5('bum): smin par bgyid pa lags/mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po dang /sems can+da rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ting nge 'dzin rnams
213b6('bum): li spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
213b7('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin
214a1('bum): par bgyid pa lpags/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags
214a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems tsan+da rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre su pa
214a3('bum): bco brgyad la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/byams pa chen po la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
214a4('bum): yongs su dag po dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/snying rje chen po la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs
214a5('bum): su smin par bgyid pa lags/thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/lam gyi rnam
214a6('bum): pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dog pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /sangs
214a7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad dngos po
214b1('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /sems can
214b2('bum): de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
214b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//bzod pa'i pha
214b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//bsam
214b5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//
214b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod
214b7('bum): cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang
215a1('bum): chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//'dus byas stong pa nyid
215a2('bum): la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
215a3('bum): la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//dor ba med pa stong
215a4('bum): pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//chos thams cad stong
215a5('bum): pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//mi dmigs
215a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lo spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//ngo bo nyid
215a7('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//
215b1('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//
215b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dres par byed do//dbang po rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//stobs rnams
215b3('bum): la spyod cing /byang chub kyi la mo la yongs su 'dris par byed do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//'phags pa'i lam yan
215b4('bum): lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//bsam
215b5('bum): gtan rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//tshad med pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
215b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dres par byed do//rnam par thar po rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//mthar
215b7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod cing /
216a1('bum): byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//ting nge 'dzin
216a2('bum): rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//de bzhin gshegs
216a3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams lnga spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//
216a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dres par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lo ma la
216a5('bum): yongs su 'dris par byed do//byams pa chen po la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//snying rje chen po la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam lnga yongs su
216a6('bum): 'dris par byed do//thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//lAm gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la
216a7('bum): yongs su 'dris par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//byang chub kyi lo ma de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
216b1('bum): nyid du rab tu shes te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang //
216b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ljon par ma gyur pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /
216b3('bum): byams pa chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du byang chub kyi lAm de la
216b4('bum): yongs su 'dris par byed de/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/lam de la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
216b5('bum): su rdzogs par byas nas/skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe de'i bge chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs/
216b6('bum): pa thams cad kyang mi skye bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/de sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong rir po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na/dngos po med
216b7('bum): par yang mi dmigs no/dngos po yod pa lta smos kyang mi smos////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya lnga pa//rab
217a1('bum): nga na pa smos sos du tu rnanan na da rgyu smon yongs sun tu / na sa klusmra
217a2('bum): //rna chan rlu sa spyod de/dngos pa ma pa ma dngos po med par yang yidul mi //len phyir s+yAd mits+tsha//mardzun mdus byu /de ma da pa' ma da sa mang
217a3('bum): med la myi rnyed //gti bu la 'jim rtog/marten mar mi byed /dngos pa yod pa'am dngos blo med par yang snyid la mi byed //byang chub kyi sems de'ang mI dmig
217a4('bum): mtshan med mi byed/yul du mi byed/yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshul khrims srung ste/de de ltar tshul khrims
217a5('bum): spyod yang mi rtog/mchen mar mi myod de/dngos po med pa'i ma dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//byang chub kyi sems de 'ong mi dmyigs d+d+hi/mtshan mar mi byed sprul
