305b3('bum): par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
305b4('bum): 'da' bar mi nus so//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon mo mchis par
305b5('bum): 'jug par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus
305b6('bum): so//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed pa ri no mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
305b7('bum): su dag por bgyi ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni rnam pa
306a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so//chos kyi 'khor
306a2('bum): lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
306a3('bum): bu la dgod par mi nus so//dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so//rang byang chub la dgod por mi nus so//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod
306a4('bum): par mi nus so//sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so//tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod namos bgyi ba'i
306a5('bum): dngos po la dgod par mi nus so//bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de
306a6('bum): bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang mi yin/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin no//gsol pa/de ltar
306a7('bum): chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems
306b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa
306b2('bum): bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gsol pa/de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
306b3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gsol pa/bcom
306b4('bum): ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs rnam par
306b5('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshor ba rnam par bsgom po bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'du shes rnam par bsgom pa
306b6('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
306b7('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
307a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shas
307a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
307a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
307a4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307a5('bum): bsgom pa'o//reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
307a6('bum): pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
307a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par
307b1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//yid kyi rnam
307b2('bum): par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307b3('bum): bsgom pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
307b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa
307b5('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg
307b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
307b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
308a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bskor/
308a2('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sa'i khams
308a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//me'i khams
308a4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
308a5('bum): nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
308a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
308a7('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom
308b1('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//skye mched drug rnam par
308b2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshor po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
308b3('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sred pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
308b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po'o//srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po'o//skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
308b5('bum): pabasgom pa'o//rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
308b6('bum): dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bras ma gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
308b7('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
309a1('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bsam gtAn bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
309a2('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//snying rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
309a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
309a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom
309a5('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa bsgom
309a6('bum): pa'o//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sangs rgyas rjes su dran
309a7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dge
309b1('bum): 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
309b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gtong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
309b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//skyo ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom
309b4('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lus kyi rnam pa rjes su
309b5('bum): dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
309b6('bum): sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
309b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
310a1('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sems can gyi 'du
310a2('bum): shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
310a3('bum): skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310a4('bum): bsgom pa'o//skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
310a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//shed can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom
310a6('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshor ba po'i 'du
310a7('bum): shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
310b1('bum): pa'o//mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
310b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
310b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
310b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom
310b5('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
310b6('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//byang chub kyi yun lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
310b7('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mtshan ma med pa'i ting ngo nge//
311a1('bum): 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
311a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
311a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
311a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med
311a5('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
311a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden
311a7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
311b1('bum): pa'o//sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
311b2('bum): pa bsgom pa'o//'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
311b3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
311b4('bum): du phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
311b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
311b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
311b7('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bzod pa'i pha
312a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
312a2('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//shes rab kyi
312a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
312a4('bum): bsgom pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rob kyi pha
312a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
312a6('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pi ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid
312a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o///
312b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//thog mA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi rol
312b2('bum): tubyin pa bsgom pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
312b3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
312b4('bum): nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
312b5('bum): pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
312b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mngon par shes pa drug rnam
312b7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gzungs
313a1('bum): kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
313a2('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
313a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
313a4('bum): pa bsgom pa'o//byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
313a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam
313a6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
313a7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
313b1('bum): pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
313b2('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
313b3('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par
313b4('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'du
313b5('bum): byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
313b6('bum): legs/ji ltar na mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313b7('bum): bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pho rol
314a1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na yid rnam par
314a2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
314a3('bum): ji ltar na sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
314a4('bum): bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rog rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha
314a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom
314a6('bum): pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
314a7('bum): lags/ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par
314b1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/
314b2('bum): pa lags/ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar nA mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom
314b3('bum): pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji
314b4('bum): ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
314b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus
314b6('bum): te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
314b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
315a1('bum): ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg/
315a2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par
315a3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher brnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha
315a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sna'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na chu'i khams rnam par
315a5('bum): /bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
315a6('bum): ji ltar na rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na nam mkhwa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
315a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar
315b1('bum): narten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi
315b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par
315b3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na ming dang gzugs rngam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
315b4('bum): ji ltar na skye mched drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ldang na reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
315b5('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sred pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
315b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
315b7('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rga shi rnam par bsgom
316a1('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
316a2('bum): lags/ji ltar na dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar nu bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
316a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags//ji ltar
316a4('bum): na bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
316a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na snying
316a6('bum): rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
316a7('bum): pa legs/ji ltar na btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
316b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa
316b2('bum): bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
316b3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms por 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
316b4('bum): logs/ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
316b5('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar
316b6('bum): na tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na gtong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
316b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na skyo ba rjes su dran
317a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
317a2('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lus
317a3('bum): kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
317a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bdag
317a5('bum): med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rabi kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab
317a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bdag
317a7('bum): gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab
317b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na skye ba'i 'du shes
317b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na gasngo ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
317b3('bum): pi lags/ji ltar na skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
317b4('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na shed can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na shing
317b5('bum): bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol
317b6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam
317b7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
318a1('bum): lags/ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/
318a2('bum): pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji
318a3('bum): ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
318a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi
318a5('bum): rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
318a6('bum): pa lags/ji ltar na stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
318a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na stong pa nyid kyi ting
318b1('bum): 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha
318b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rnam par
318b3('bum): thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
318b4('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
318b5('bum): byiphyin pa bsgom pa lags/dza~M ltar na rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam por bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rtog
318b6('bum): po med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par
318b7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
319a1('bum): pra bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na
319a2('bum): lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
319a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'gog
319a4('bum): pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
319a5('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom
319a6('bum): pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji
319a7('bum): ltar na rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
319b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sgra ji bzhin
319b2('bum): shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha
319b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bzod
319b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
319b5('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
319b6('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
319b7('bum): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na
320a1('bum): phyi narang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa
320a2('bum): bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji
320a3('bum): ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
320a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar
320a5('bum): na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par
320a6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320a7('bum): bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid
320b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
320b2('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam
320b3('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
320b4('bum): pa lags/ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug rnam
320b5('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
320b6('bum): pa lags/ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrim pa lags/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
320b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
321a1('bum): pa lags/ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi
321a2('bum): chosnga ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes
321a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs
321a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
321a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na phyir mi 'dra ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji
321a6('bum): ltar nu dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rang byang chub rnam pararo bsgomu pa bsgom pa/shas
321a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar
321b1('bum): narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/de ltar na brag chags kyi mtshams sbyar ba'i nyan mongs smra
321b2('bum): thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrog brgya pa//bam po nyis
321b3('bum): brgya re dgu pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'odri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs
321b4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//tshar ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
321b5('bum): skom mo//rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mig dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rno ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sna dngos po yod
321b6('bum): ces bya bar mi sdom mo//lce dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//yang dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//gzugs dngos
321b7('bum): po mod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//dri dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skam mo//ro dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//reg dngos
322a1('bum): thos byu sa smo s+ho//nas ngas pas nas byu marnamam//mag+ga rnam snar thos pa das pa dang rdzas byung mo zlus ma/
322a2('bum): bang byas pa dngas pa song ces skyob mi rlom ma//pa'i rnam pa du shes pa dngos po med ces bya ba mi sgo ma mo//lce'i rnam par shes phye dngos po yad ces bya ba mi ma
322a3('bum): lus kyi rnam pa shes pa rdungs po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mig gi 'dus te rag pa dngos po yod ces
322a4('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skam mo//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po
322a5('bum): yod ces bya bar mi snyam mo//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi snyim mo//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skam mo//mig gi 'dus te
322a6('bum): drug pa'i rkyen gyis d+hi byu dngas pa yod rjes byu b+ha mi sgom mo//d+hU ba'i 'dus te drug pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces byu ba mi snyam mo//sna'i 'dus te gA pa'i
322a7('bum): gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tsho
322b1('bum): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//chu'i
322b2('bum): khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//me'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//nom mkha'i khams dngos
322b3('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//ma rig
322b4('bum): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//ming dang gzugs dngos po
322b5('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//skye mched drug dngos po yod ces bya ba ri ma sgom mo//reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//tshor ba dngas po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
322b6('bum): sred pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//len pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//srid po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//skye ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
322b7('bum): sgom mo//rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//blang ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bsam gtan dang po dngos po
323a1('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bsam
323a2('bum): gtan bzhi pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//byams pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dga' ba dngos po yod ces
323a3('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo//btang snyoms dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
323a4('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//cung zod med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar
323a5('bum): mi sgom mo//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar
323a6('bum): mi sgom mo//chos rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dngos
323a7('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//gtong ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lha rjes su dran po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//skyo ba rjes su
323b1('bum): dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'chi ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
323b2('bum): mo//lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo//mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dngos po yang
323b3('bum): ces bya bar myi sgom mo//bdag med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yid ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yid ces bya bar mi sgrim mo//dngos po med pa'i 'a
323b4('bum): shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sems can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//srog gi
323b5('bum): 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//gso ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//skyes bu'i
323b6('bum): 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//gang zug gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//shed can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//shed
323b7('bum): bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//byed pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//tshar ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
324a1('bum): mo//shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rtag pa'i 'du shes
324a2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bde ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bdag gi 'du
324a3('bum): shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
324a4('bum): mo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
324a5('bum): mo//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lam dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
324a6('bum): sgom mo//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rnam par thar pa
324a7('bum): brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i
324b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/
324b2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
324b3('bum): sgom mo//'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sdug bsngal shes pa dngos
324b4('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'gog pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lam shes pa dngos po
324b5('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//zad pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mi skye ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//chos shes pa dngos po yod ces bya
324b6('bum): bar mi sgom mo//rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//kun rdzobo shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'dris pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya
324b7('bum): bar mi sgom mo//sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
325a1('bum): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces
325a2('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo//bsam gratan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//nang stong pa
325a3('bum): nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbom mo//phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//stong pa nyid stong pa
325a4('bum): nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dron dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'dus byas
325a5('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar
325a6('bum): mi sgom mo//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rang bzhin stong pa nyid
325a7('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
325b1('bum): mo//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
325b2('bum): sgom mo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mngon par shes pa drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//ting nge 'dzin thams cad dngos
325b3('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//mi 'jigs
325b4('bum): pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi snyam mo//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces
325b5('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo//byams pa chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces
325b6('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//dgra bcom pa nyid dngos
325b7('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
326a1('bum): pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//de
326a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
326a3('bum): pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po med do//
326a4('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du

327a1('bum): pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la byams pa chen po bsgom pa med do///

327a6('bum): 'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gi nyes la chags te/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes

340a4('bum): nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/mngon par shes pa drug yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga lnga yod/ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba/
340a5('bum): lta ga la yod/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/mi
340a6('bum): 'jigs pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
340a7('bum): rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/byams pa chen po yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/snying rje chen po yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
340b1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/
340b2('bum): yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/rang byang chub yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/lam
340b3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/gang la lam bsgom pa
340b4('bum): med pa de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'ang ga la yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ga la
340b5('bum): yod/rang byang chub kyang ga la yod/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ga la yod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ga la yod/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs
340b6('bum): pa thams cad spangs pa'ang ga la yod/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u lnga bcu dgu pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom
340b7('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dngos po'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang ma mchis pas/'thob pa lta ga la mchis te/
341a1('bum): ma mchis/mngon par rtogs pa lta 'dra ga la mchis te/ma mchis na ji lags/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod//
341a2('bum): pa'am/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa 'am/rigs kyi sa 'am/brgyad pa'i sa 'am/mthong ba'i sa 'am/bsrabs pa'i sa 'am/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa 'am/byas
341a3('bum): pa rtogs pa'i sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing /nyon mongs pa gang gos
341a4('bum): bsgribs pas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
341a5('bum): nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/bag tshogs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spongs pa'i sgrib pa nyan thos
341a6('bum): dang ldan pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang skye
341a7('bum): ba mchis na ji ltar chos de dag ma skyed par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de
341b1('bum): bzhin te/dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la mngon par rtogs pa'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes
341b2('bum): can la dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la rigs kyi sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la brgyad pa'i sa med do//dngos
341b3('bum): po med pa'i 'du shes can la mthong ba'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la bsrabs pa'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la 'dod chags dang
341b4('bum): bral ba'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med do//dngos po med pa'i
341b5('bum): 'du shes can la byang chub sems dpa'i sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi sa med do//dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la lam bsgom pa gang la
341b6('bum): brten cing nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pas/rnam pa
341b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spong ba'i
342a1('bum): sgrib pa/nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
342a2('bum): ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa dang /dngos po ma mchis par 'du
342a3('bum): shes pa mchis sam/gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /'du shes su 'du shes pa dang /'du byed du 'du shes pa dang /rnam par shes par 'du shes
342a4('bum): pa dang /mig tu 'du shes pa dang /rna bar 'du shes pa dang /snar 'du shes pa dang /lcer 'du shes pa dang /lus su 'du shes pa dang /yid du 'du shes pa dang /gzugs/
342a5('bum): su 'du shes pa dang /sgrar 'du shes pa dang /drir 'du shes pa dang /ror 'du shes pa dang /reg tu 'du shes pa dang /chos su 'du shes pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes
342a6('bum): par 'du shes pa dang /rno ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam
342a7('bum): par shes par 'du shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /sna
342b1('bum): 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /mig
342b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /

342b4('bum): dang /sa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang /chu'i khams su 'du shes pa dang /me'i khams su 'du shes pa dang /rlung gi khams su 'du shes pa dang /nam mkha'i khams su 'du
342b5('bum): shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang /'dod chags su 'du shes pa dang /'dod chags spang bar 'du shes pa dang /zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang /zhe sdang
342b6('bum): spang bar 'du shes pa dang /gti mug tu 'du shes pa dang /gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang /ma rig par 'du shes pa dang /ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /'du byed du
342b7('bum): 'du shes pa dang /'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang /rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs su 'du shes pa
343a1('bum): dang /ming dang gzugs spang bar 'du shes pa dang /skye mched drug tu 'du shes pa dang /skye mched drug spang bar 'du shes pa dang /reg par 'du shes pa dang //
343a2('bum): reg pa spang byar 'du shes pa dang /tshar bar 'du shes pa dang /tshor ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /sred par 'du shes pa dang /sred pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /len par
343a3('bum): 'du shes pa dang /len pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /srid par 'du shes pa dang /srid pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /skye bar 'du shes pa dang /skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /
343a4('bum): rga shir 'du shes pa dang /rga shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /sdug
343a5('bum): bsngal du 'du shes pa dang /sdug bsngal kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa dang /kun 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /'gog par 'du shes

343a7('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor de ni med do//rab
343b1('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos gang la'ang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/dngos po med par 'du shes
343b2('bum): pa med do//gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /dngos po med par 'du shes po de nyid ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i bzod pa'o//gang la dngos
343b3('bum): po yod par 'du shes pa dang /dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni lam sgom pa'o//gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de
343b4('bum): nyid ni 'bras bu'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa ste/mngon par rtogs pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs
343b5('bum): nges kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags
343b6('bum): na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/de dag mngon par rdzogs par
343b7('bum): sangs rgyas pas/chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
344a1('bum): bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di lang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/'dod pas dpon sdig to mi dge ba'i chos
344a2('bum): kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam par rtog
344a3('bum): pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med par pyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba
344a4('bum): dang bde ba can/bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms
344a5('bum): la gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong zhing 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam
344a6('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsnga lnga pa'ang spangs shing /sdo ma'i yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba'ang
344a7('bum): med/sdug bsngal yang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/'on kyang ngas bsam gtan
344b1('bum): de dag dang /bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/bsam gtan de dag gis bsnyems par ma gyur/bsam gtan gyiraro myong bar ma gyur/bsam gtan du
344b2('bum): dmigs par ma gyur te/de ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par bzhag go/de ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas/
344b3('bum): shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/sems gzho lnga par bya/pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya/
344b4('bum): ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/sems gzhal
344b5('bum): bar bya/'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/ro myong bar ma gyur/dmigs par
344b6('bum): ma gyur te/mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par bzhag pa ste/de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis
344b7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/'di ni sdug bsngal lo//'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog
345a1('bum): pa'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
345a2('bum): stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyur/snying rje
345a3('bum): chen po dang ldan par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to//rab 'byor gyis
345a4('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan
345a5('bum): bzhi bskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mngon par shes pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa bskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de
345a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid
345a7('bum): kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byams pa chen po poskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo
345b1('bum): nyid kyi snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur/ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso brgyad bskyed par gyur/sems can rnams kyang sems can ma
345b2('bum): mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te 'dod po rnams dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos
345b3('bum): po zhig yod de/ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/rab 'byor nges sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i
345b4('bum): ngo bo nyid dang /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du reg nas/bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gonas por yang mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'di ltar
345b5('bum): 'dod pa rnams dang /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/rab
345b6('bum): 'byor de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa
345b7('bum): los skyes po'i dga' bo dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to//rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/nang yongs su
346a1('bum): dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
346a2('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to//dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral pos dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la
346a3('bum): 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
346a4('bum): par gyur to//bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang mod/sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms
346a5('bum): dang dran pas/yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to//rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod do//
346a6('bum): bo nyid yod pa 'am/gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/rab 'byor ngos kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/bla na med pa yang dag byung
346a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po med de/ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi
346b1('bum): dngos po med pa ste/gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes
346b2('bum): pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rab 'byor gyis gsol
346b3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes
346b4('bum): pa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyan/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du/chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo
346b5('bum): nyid la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyod pa dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
346b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par gyur/bcom ldan
346b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'
347a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po dag dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /rgyun du zhugs
347a2('bum): pa dag las/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rang
347a3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /lan cig phyir
347a4('bum): 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /'phags pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /'du byed rnams
347a5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang med do zhes bya bar thos na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ci ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
347a6('bum): rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
347a7('bum): nyid/dgra bcom pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
347b1('bum): nyid/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/gral te bdag bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung /gal
347b2('bum): te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyis/ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
347b3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems
347b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/mthar gyis spyad//
347b5('bum): pa dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba glang la bslabs shing /sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i
347b6('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba rtsom mo//de thog mar sbyin
347b7('bum): po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
348a1('bum): drang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do//de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong/
348a2('bum): ngongo/pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go//sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gong sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas
348a3('bum): dga' bar spyod do//de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te/skyon dang /ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba dang /sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar
348a4('bum): byed de/zas 'dod pa la ni zas/skom 'dod pa la ni skom/bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/gos 'dod pa la ni gos/spos 'dod pa la ni spos/phreng ba 'dod pa la
348a5('bum): ni phreng ba/byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/gnas 'dod pa lani gnas/mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me/nor bu dang me tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /
348a6('bum): dung dang man shal dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/nor bu dang mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang mal shelA dang /b+hu ru dang /gser dang /dngul
348a7('bum): yongs su gtong ba nas/mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba dag kyang /de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/de sbyin po de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
348b1('bum): lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do//mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do//de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims de nyid kyis/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do//de sbyin pa dang /tshu
348b2('bum): khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis/shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do//de sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab de nyid kyis/rnam par grol ba'i
348b3('bum): phung po rab tu thob par byed do//de sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /sheso rab dang /rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu
348b4('bum): thob par byed do//de sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis/nyan thos dang rang
348b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/
348b6('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//chos
348b7('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'ogad cing /'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
349a1('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do//rab
349a2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gzhan yang
349a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do//gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag
349a4('bum): gi'ang legs pa brjod cing /mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//ngo tshul khrims des lha'i tsho ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do//mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do//de nor med pa'i
349a5('bum): sems can rnams la nor byin zhing /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do//ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'gyod do//shes rab la rab tu 'grod do//rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do//
349a6('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bral rab tu 'god do//de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang //
349a7('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung
349b1('bum): po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med/
349b2('bum): par zhugs nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/sems can rnams yongs su smin por byas nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//rnam pa thams
349b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /'khor ba las yongs su krol
349b4('bum): bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar rwa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir
349b5('bum): zhe na/dri ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bdag kyang bzod pa'i
349b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la smod do//gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do//gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha
349b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing /mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su chem
350a1('bum): par byed do//tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do//ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do//shes rab la rab tu 'god do//rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do//rnam
350a2('bum): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do//de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnams
350a3('bum): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi
350a4('bum): phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon mod par 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i
350a5('bum): skyon med par zhugs nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//
350a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /'khor ba
350a7('bum): las yongs su grol bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/de thams cad kyang
350b1('bum): dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
350b2('bum): ste/bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo//gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dgra par bskul lo//brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do//gzhan gang brtson
350b3('bum): 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing /mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim
