461b2('bum): chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des snying rje chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
461b3('bum): ngo /des snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang
461b4('bum): dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des sangs rgyas kyi
461b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi
461b6('bum): mthong ngo //des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su
461b7('bum): mi mthong ngo //des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po rnams kyi tshogs yang dge bar
462a1('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang /
462a2('bum): su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang drag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rgyun
462a3('bum): duzhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong de//des sbyin du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag pa rjes su ma mthong bas/rgyun du zhugs
462a4('bum): po'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag byar rjes su mi mthong bas/rgyun du grogs
462a5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gso ba nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang drag par rjes su mthong ngo //des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
462a6('bum): yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes
462a7('bum): su ma mthong bas/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye bo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye bo yang dag par rjes su mtsha
462b1('bum): bas/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/lan cig/
462b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang
462b3('bum): dodag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
462b4('bum): bas/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/phyir mi 'ong ba'i
462b5('bum): 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag por rjes su ma mthong bas/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
462b6('bum): tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gso ba nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub
462b7('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba yang
463a1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi
463a2('bum): mthong ngo //des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi tsho gas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid
463a3('bum): du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des rong byang chub kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des rang byang chub kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa
463a4('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rang byang chub kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des rang byang chub kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rang byang chub kyi skye ba'i sgo
463a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des rang byang chub kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rang byang chub kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid
463a6('bum): dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des lam
463a7('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo ///
463b1('bum): dris lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
463b2('bum): nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par
463b3('bum): rjes su mthong ngo //des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /
463b4('bum): yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag
463b5('bum): ngar rjes su ma mthong bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye bo'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma
463b6('bum): mthong bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tsho gros yang dag por rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/gzugs kyi
463b7('bum): rang bzhin mi dmigs so//tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//'du shes kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi
464a1('bum): dmigs so//mig gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sna'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lce'i rlung bzhin mi dmigs so//lus/
464a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//yid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sgra'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//dri'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//
464a3('bum): ro'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//reg gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//chos kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam
464a4('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes
464a5('bum): ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te re gra pa'i
464a6('bum): rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs sngo//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi
464a7('bum): dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
464b1('bum): gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs s+ho///
464b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi
464b3('bum): dmyigs so//chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs s+ho//me'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dra migs so//rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//namA mkha'i khams kyi rang
464b4('bum): bzhin mi dramigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//ma rig pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rnam par shes
464b5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//skye mched drug gi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//tshor ba'i rang
464b6('bum): bzhin mi dmigs so//sred pa'i rang bzhin mi dmyigs so//ldan pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//srid pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//skye ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//
464b7('bum): rga shi'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mo dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol/
465a1('bum): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//bAsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs
465a2('bum): so/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
465a3('bum): rang bzhin mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs
465a4('bum): so//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//
465a5('bum): theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//chos
465a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//dngos
465a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//
465b1('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//dbang
465b2('bum): /po rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
465b3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dA mi gros so//bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams kyi rang
465b4('bum): bzhin mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas
465b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so///
465b6('bum): smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi
465b7('bum): sgri rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//so so yang dag
466a1('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi
466a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so///
466a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
466a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i
466a5('bum): rang bzhin de nyid du rtogs par byed de/de de ltar rtogs par byed cing nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid
466a6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid lo spyod pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus mo byas stong pa nyid la spyod
466a7('bum): pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod po dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa stong po nyid la spyod pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
466b1('bum): la spyod pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
466b2('bum): spyod pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par
466b3('bum): shes pa 'am/mig gam/rna ba 'am/sna 'am/lce 'am/lus sam/yid dam/gzugs sam/sgra 'am/dri 'am/ro 'am/reg gam/chos sam/mig gi rnam par shes pa
466b4('bum): 'am/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am/mig gi 'dus te
466b5('bum): reg pa 'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'ami/sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/mig gi 'dus
466b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/
466b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sa'i khams sam/chu'i khams sam/me'i khams sa mo/rlung gi khams
467a1('bum): sam/nam mkha'i khams sam/rnam par shes pa'i khams snyam/ma rig pa 'am/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/ming dang gzugs
467a2('bum): sam/skye mched drug gam/reg pa 'am/tsho ra ba 'am/sred pa 'am/ldan pa 'am/srid pa 'am/skye ba 'am/rga shi 'am/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims
467a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
467a4('bum): 'am/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid dmo/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas
467a5('bum): stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog mA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/rang bzhin
467a6('bum): stong pa nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong
467a7('bum): pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang
467b1('bum): po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams
467b2('bum): sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sngam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam
467b3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs
467b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
467b5('bum): sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/dragra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/bla na med pa yang dag
467b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/chos gang la'ang mngon par chags pa med do//de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub kyi lam yongs su
467b7('bum): rdzogs par byed de/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
468a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
468a2('bum): dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong po nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang
468a3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong
468a4('bum): pa nyid dang /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dge par spong ba
468a5('bum): rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags
468a6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas
468a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams
468b1('bum): dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying
468b2('bum): rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin to//
468b3('bum): de byang chub kyi lam rnam par smin pa'i chos can la gnas pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /bzod pa'i
468b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
468b5('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
468b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /'dus ma
468b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /dor ba med pa
469a1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid
469a2('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
469a3('bum): rdzogs pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs
469a4('bum): pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs
469a5('bum): pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
469a6('bum): tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /mthar gyis
469a7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa
469b1('bum): lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas/sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so//gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par
469b2('bum): bya ba de dag la'ang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so//gong la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang bzod pas phan 'dogs so//gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan
469b3('bum): gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so//gang la bsam gtan gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang bsam gtan gyis phan 'dogs so//gang la
469b4('bum): shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so//gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs
469b5('bum): so//gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so//gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
469b6('bum): bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do//gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
469b7('bum): 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do//gang phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do//gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par
470a1('bum): bya ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do//grang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do//gang bla na med
470a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do//de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam
470a3('bum): par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che
470a4('bum): de dag las grub par mngon par sgrub ste/de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/des
470a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas/ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/'di ltar dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang /skyid pa
470a6('bum): lta bu dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan btsal ba dang bral ba dag na/longs spyod dang /skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste/de rnam par smin pa las byung
470a7('bum): ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
470b1('bum): rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes
470b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
470b3('bum): spyod cing /chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thong ste/gal te ji tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /tshor ba
470b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /'du shes yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /'du byed yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /mig yongs
470b5('bum): su bzung ba med pa dang /rna ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /sna yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /lce yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /lus yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /yid
470b6('bum): yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /sgra yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /dri yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /ro yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
470b7('bum): reg yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /chos yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung
471a1('bum): ba med pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs
471a2('bum): su bzung ba med pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung /
471a3('bum): bA med pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
471a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te rig pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
471a5('bum): yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung po med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /
471a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /sa'i khams yongs su
471a7('bum): bzung ba med pa dang /chu'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /me'i khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /rlung gi khams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /nam mkha'

471b5('bum): dang /'jig rten pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams
471b6('bum): yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /'dus byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos
471b7('bum): rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs spyod pa dang /
472a1('bum): skyid pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bzung ba
472a2('bum): med pa ste/chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba med pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

473b2('bum): pastong phrag brgya pa//blam pA nyis brgya don lnga pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos
473b3('bum): thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing /mtshan ma me mchis la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags na/ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
473b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
473b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/zag pa dang bcos pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' bo lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
473b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bzod

474a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
474a2('bum): tu phyin par nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi nang stong pa nyid

475a1('bum): lags /ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par/

475b1('bum): ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la/'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bur gdags par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa
475b2('bum): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
475b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //tshul khrims srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge

475b5('bum): rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //tshul khrims srung ngo //bzod pa

475b7('bum): srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su
476a1('bum): gtong ngo //tshul khrims srung ngo //bzong paskum mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//sku brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'o//
476a2('bum): phung po lnga la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtang ngo //tshul khrims srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin skom mo//shes rab sgom mo//
476a3('bum): gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bor len pa'i phung bro lnga la gnas shing sbyin po yongs su gtong ngo //tshul khrims srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin
476a4('bum): sgom mo//shes rabasgom mo//dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /tshul khrims srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//
476a5('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /sbyin pa yongs su glatong ngo //tshul khrims
476a6('bum): srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rnam mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//de 'di ltar rtog ste/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste mtshan
476a7('bum): nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i phung pi lnga ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i
476b1('bum): phung po lnga ni chu zla lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni mig yor lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//nye bur len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/mtshan
476b2('bum): nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//
476b3('bum): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/sprul pa lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rmi lam la rang bzhin gang yang med do//sgyu ma la rang bzhin gang yang med do//smig
476b4('bum): rgyu la rang bzhin gang yang med do//chu zla la rang bzhin gang yang med do//mig yor la rang bzhin glang yang med do//sgra brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang med do//gzugs brnyan la
476b5('bum): rang bzhin gang yang med do//dri za'i grong khyer la rang bzhin gang yang med do//sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang med do//gang la rang bzhin med pa de la mtshan nyid med de/gang la
476b6('bum): mtshan nyid med pa de ni/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par byed de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/
476b7('bum): sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o//gtong ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o//len pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/gang de ltar shes na/sbyin pa gtong ba de ni/
477a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
477a2('bum): las phyir mi ldog go/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir
477a3('bum): mi ldog go/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go/de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshad
477a4('bum): med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
477a5('bum): byed do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stobs
477a6('bum): lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//nang
477a7('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
477b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
477b2('bum): par byed do//'dus mo byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs
477b3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
477b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su
477b5('bum): rdzogs par byed do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su
477b6('bum): rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do//smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su
477b7('bum): rdzogs par byed do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//ting nge 'dzin thams
478a1('bum): cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de
478a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//snying
478a3('bum): rjechen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi cho sdo ma 'dres pa bco brgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de 'phags pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong
478a4('bum): me yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chud med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
478a5('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dog gi drung du/rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen sman
478a6('bum): dang /yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/longs spyod dang /skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do//de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba
478a7('bum): de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do//gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do//gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang
478b1('bum): bzod pas yongs su sdud do//gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su sdud do//gang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin
478b2('bum): gyis yongs su sdud do//gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do//gang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /nang stong pa nyid/
478b3('bum): kyis yongs su sdud do//gang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud ngo //gang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi/
478b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdod do//gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang chen po stong pa nyid kyis/
478b5('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do///
478b6('bum): gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus
478b7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su spyad do//gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang
479a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gAng dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
479a2('bum): kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
479a3('bum): sdud do//gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
479a4('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
479a5('bum): su sdud do//gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
479a6('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
479a7('bum): nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang yang dag par
479b1('bum): spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rdzu 'phrul
479b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /dbang po rnams kyis yongs su spyad do//gang stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba
479b3('bum): de dag kyang /stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gling byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu su bsdu ba de dag kyang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang
479b4('bum): lam gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /lam gyis yongs su sdud ngo //gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
479b5('bum): kyis yongs su sdud do//gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu
479b6('bum): bde dag kyang /cheng med pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa'i
479b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
480a1('bum): rnams par 'ag rnams sa ngas su bsgru dag kyang /mthang rgyas gnas pa snyoms pang 'jug pa rnams sa yongs sa sdud do//gang rnam par dang
480a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa meng pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
480a3('bum): pas yongs su spyad do//gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
480a4('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su
480a5('bum): sdud do//gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do//gang mi 'jigs pa
480a6('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su spyod do//gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsgrib de dag kyang /so so yang
480a7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud ngo //gang byams pa chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /byams pa chen pos yongs su sdud do//gang snying rje chen pos yongs
480b1('bum): su bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su sdung ngo //gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
480b2('bum): yongs su sdud do//gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do//gang lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs
480b3('bum): su bsdu ba de dag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do//gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su
480b4('bum): sdud ngo //gang dgra bcom po nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgra bcom po nyid kyis yongs su spyad do//gang rang byang chub kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rang byang chub
480b5('bum): kyis yongs su sdung ngo //gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
480b6('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//de ltar grang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
480b7('bum): kyang /dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do//de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/'khor ba nye bar len kyang 'khor ba'i
481a1('bum): sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te/de sems can rnams kyi don du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems can
481a2('bum): rnams yongs su sdud de//de chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so//lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu shes
481a3('bum): kyang de la mi gnas so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so//dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so//rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so//
481a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par bya ste/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
481a5('bum): par bya ba'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med
481a6('bum): par shes so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
481a7('bum): mtshan nyid med par shes so//bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so//sheso rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so//nang stong pa nyid
481b1('bum): mtshan nyid med par shes so//phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//
481b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//'dus ma byas stong pa/
481b3('bum): nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//dor ba
481b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//rang gi mtshan
481b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//ngo bo nyid
481b6('bum): stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so///
481b7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//dbang po rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//stobs
482a1('bum): rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid med
482a2('bum): par shes so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//tshad med pa rnams mtshan nyid med par
482a3('bum): shes so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i
482a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mtshan nyid med par shes so//
482a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//gzungs kyi skye rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//de
482a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid
482a7('bum): med par shes so//byams pa chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so//snying rje chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan
482b1('bum): nyid med par shes so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma chen
482b2('bum): nyid med par shes so//dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//rang byang chub mtshan nyid med par shes so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so///
482b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
482b4('bum): rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bor len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/chu zlo lta bu'i nye
482b5('bum): bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/skra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar
482b6('bum): len+da pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
482b7('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/nye bar len pa'i phung
483a1('bum): po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smrig rgyu lta bur shwas/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga chu zla lta bur shes/nye bar len pa'i byang po lnga me
483a2('bum): yor lta bur shes/nye ba len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grang
483a3('bum): khyer lta bur shes/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa/ma zhig pa/mA ral ba/skyoran med pa/rnyog pa
483a4('bum): med pa/nyams pa med pa/dbang du gyur pa/mkhas pas bsngags pa/shin tu rdzogs pa/'phags par gyur pa/zag pa med pa/lam gyi khongs su chud pa/'jig rten
483a5('bum): las 'das pa/yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i brda dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /sdom
483a6('bum): pa'i tshul khrims dang /dramigs pa'i tshul khrims dang /spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang /mi spyad pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo //de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan pa'ang 'dis bdag
483a7('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/khyim bdag che zhing mtho bo'i rigs dang skal ba
483b1('bum): mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am/rgyal phran nam/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe
483b2('bum): 'am/sum norta gsum mam/mtsho ma 'am/dga' ldan nAm/'phrul dga' 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am//rgyun du zhugs
483b3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra btsam pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bum/byang chub thob par bya'o/
483b4('bum): zhes tshul khrims des snyoms pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid
483b5('bum): gcig pas na/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung
483b6('bum): ngo //mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis kyang /mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
483b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/byang chub sems
484a1('bum): dra pa'i skyon med par 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i tshe/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod
484a2('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam par smin po las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgyad //ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/so so yang dag par rig
484a3('bum): pa bzhi thob nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/sems can rnams kyang yongs su
484a4('bum): smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to//de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang /'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par mi 'gyur te/'di ltar dper na
484a5('bum): sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/sdod pa 'am/'dug pa'am/nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba 'am/sdod pa 'am/'dug pa 'am/nyal ba'ang mi dmigs te/de sems
484a6('bum): can rnams kyi don kyang byed do//sems can dang sems can du btags pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
484a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/
484b1('bum): sems can tshad med pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
484b2('bum): de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas/des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas sprul pa sprul par mdzad de/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
484b3('bum): 'das so//rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/
484b4('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das por gyur to//yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa
484b5('bum): 'am/dngos po gang yang dmigs su med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can nam sems can du gdugs pa'ang mi dmigs
484b6('bum): la/sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mtshan nyid med
484b7('bum): pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad khongs su chud par shes so//rab 'byor
485a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/
485a2('bum): sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len po'i phung po lnga la gnas te/mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pa
485a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha
485a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
485a5('bum): su rdzogs par byed de/gnyis gang zhe na/nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang /chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o//de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/sems
485a6('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bur du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang dang
485a7('bum): yang 'ong so shing gshe ba 'am/mi snyan par brjod cing maklas pa'i tshig brlang po zer bar gyur tam/rdo dbyug dang /mtshon chas brdegs sam/btab kyang de la byang
485b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrugs pa dang ldan pa 'am//gnod sems
485b2('bum): dang ldan pa bskyed par mi bya ste/phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems mi skyed
485b3('bum): kyi/'di ni bdog nyid kyis phung po'i dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o//byams pa dang ldan te snying rje bar gyur nas/rnam
485b4('bum): pa de ltar rtog pa 'dri ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o//de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmigs su med na/badrag
485b5('bum): la ga she ba'am/mi snyan par brjod pa'am/ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/'du byed thams cad ni sgra
485b6('bum): ma lta bu gso ba gsog rag las pa/nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang sems can dang /srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shing
485b7('bum): bdag dang bral ba ste/rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/bdag la gshe ba dang /mi snyan par brjod pa dang /ma klas pa'i tshig brlang
486a1('bum): por zer ba dang /rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar
486a2('bum): bzung ste/de ltar rnam par brtag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/de de ltar yongs su rtog cing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
486a3('bum): su rdzogs par byed de/de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi skye
486a4('bum): ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang 'graso/dri la spangs pa nI ci mchis/ye shes ni ni mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos gang lo
486a5('bum): rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o//de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo//gsol po/bcom ldan 'das
486a6('bum): nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
486a7('bum): pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi bo ci mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spang
486b1('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
486b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//dgra bcom
486b3('bum): pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /spang ba gang yin
486b4('bum): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin
486b5('bum): no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/de rnam par smin
486b6('bum): pa las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de yongs su
486b7('bum): rdzogs pas/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/de mngon par
487a1('bum): shes pa lnga dang mi 'bral ba yin/de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi
487a2('bum): zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes
487a3('bum): rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
487a4('bum): mtshan nyid med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
487a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nyo ba
487a6('bum): len po'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo//de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub ste/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
487a7('bum): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngag tu song nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sems can rnams kyi don byed do//sangs rgyas
487b1('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/rab 'byor de ltar na/
487b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de//
487b3('bum): sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa med pa/lam gyi yan lag tu gyur po/lam gyi khongs su chud pas/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/
487b4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa
487b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam
487b6('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
487b7('bum): rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad yongs su 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de la spyod cing
488a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de yongs su rdzogs pas bag chags kyi
488a2('bum): mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sman
488a3('bum): tusnang ba thob par byas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba bskor bar 'gyur ro//de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
488a4('bum): khrims rnam po drug tu g.yo ba dang /rab tu g.yo bA dang /ku na nas g.yo ba dang /'gul ba dang /rang tu 'gul ba dang /kun nas 'gul ba dang /ldeg pa dang /rab tu ldeg
488a5('bum): pa dang /kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs
488a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grags par 'gyur ba'i sgra de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
488a7('bum): can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
488b1('bum): po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
488b2('bum): rdzogs par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byo'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
488b3('bum): tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga lu gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smika rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po
488b4('bum): lnga la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byir ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
488b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar
488b6('bum): len po'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
488b7('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//bsam gtan bsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//bsam gtan
489a1('bum): bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gaM nas so//snying rje la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs
489a2('bum): te gnas so//btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//nam mkha' mtha' yis skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nyi
489a3('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so//cung zad med po'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnos so//stong
489a4('bum): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
489a5('bum): la gnas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos dang thun mong pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang /gzhan
489a6('bum): yang ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang /ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /
489a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myang bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid
489b1('bum): med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/dngos po med pa'i chos kyang
489b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga lnga 'gyur te/de ro myong bar byed pa med pas ting nge 'dzin gang gis dbang gos kyang /gzugs kyi khams sam//gzugs med pa'i
489b3('bum): khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang mi dmigs/gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /gang gis snyoms par 'jug pa de'ang mi dmigs
489b4('bum): so//de mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
489b5('bum): sa las yongs su 'da'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
489b6('bum): par bgyis shing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba ljags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
489b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa
490a1('bum): nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid lnga shin tu bslabs pa dang /'dus byas stong pa
490a2('bum): nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med
490a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa
490a4('bum): nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
490a5('bum): la shin tu bslabs pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun
490a6('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bama?/gang la gnas par bya
490a7('bum): ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ces bya ba de'ang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpo'
490b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su shin tu 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
490b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'
490b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no//mi dmigs pa thams cad ni skyon med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags/mi dmigs pa ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das
490b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//rab 'byor tshor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
490b5('bum): dmigs pa'o//rab 'byor 'du shes ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//rab 'byor 'du byed ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs
490b6('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigasu pa'o//mig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs
490b7('bum): pa'o//rna ba dang sgrani byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//sna dang dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//lce dang ro ni byung
491a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//lus dang reg bya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//yid dang chos ni byung
491a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
491a3('bum): gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o///
491a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa ni dmigs
491a5('bum): pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o//lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
491a6('bum): dmigs pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o//yid kyi 'dus
491a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//sa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o//chu'i khams ni dmigs pa'o//me'i khams ni dmigs pa'o//rlung gi khams ni dmigs pa ni
491b1('bum): nam mkha'i khams ni dmigs pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o//ma rig pa ni dmigs pa'o//'du byed ni dmigs pa'o//rnam par shes pa ni dmigs
491b2('bum): pa'o//ming dang gzugs ni dmigs pa'o//skye mched drug ni dmigs pa'o//reg pa ni dmigs pa'o//tshor ba ni dmigs po'o//srid pa ni dmigs pa'o//len pa ni dmigs
491b3('bum): pa'o//srid pa ni dmigs pa'o//skye ba ni dmigs pa'o//rga shi ni dmigs pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o//
491b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigaso pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o//bsdam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
491b5('bum): dmigs pa'o//nang stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid ni
491b6('bum): dmyigs pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni
491b7('bum): dmigs pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid
492a1('bum): ni dmigs pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//
492a2('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams ni//
492a3('bum): dmigs pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o//dbang po rnams ni dmigs pa'o//stobs rnams ni dmigs pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dmigs pa'o///
492a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dmigs pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o//bsam gtan rnams ni dmigs pa'o//tshad med pa rnams ni dmigs
492a5('bum): pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dmigs pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dmigs
492a6('bum): pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni dmigs pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni
492a7('bum): dmigs pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dmigs pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dmigs pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dmigs pa'o//so so yang dag par
492b1('bum): rig pa bzhi ni dmigs pa'o//byams pa chen po ni dmigs pa'o//snying rje chen po ni dmigs pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dmigs pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i
492b2('bum): 'bras bu ni dmigs pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmigs pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmigs pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o//rang byang chub ni
492b3('bum): dmigs pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes po nyid ni dmigs pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs pa ste skyon no//rab 'byor skyon med pa nyid ni gang la gzugs dang /tshor
492b4('bum): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /mig dang /rna ba dang /smra dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /
492b5('bum): chos dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par
492b6('bum): shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg
492b7('bum): pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
493a1('bum): tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba dang /sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
493a2('bum): dang ta rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched//
493a3('bum): drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //bzod/
493a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid
493a5('bum): dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
493a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang
493a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa
493b1('bum): nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
493b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i 'dren pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad me nga rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
493b3('bum): rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /
493b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig
493b5('bum): pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
493b6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rlung byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /chos de drug gri brjod pa'ang
493b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya don drug pa//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs
494a1('bum): la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//tshor ba la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//

495b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa ni brjod du med pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med
496a1('bum): pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin

496a4('bum): bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid
